text: phir ve donon chale, yahaan tak ki jab ve ek basteevaalon ke paas pahunche aur unase bhojan maanga, kintu unhonne unake aatithy se inakaar kar diya. phir vahaan unhen ek deevaar milee jo gira chaahatee thee, to us vyakti ne usako khada kar diya. (moosa ne) kaha, "yadi aap chaahate to isakee kuchh mazadooree le sakate the.
